articles.title: Can Straight Actors Play Gay Characters? | Good Morning Britain - Good Morning Britain
articles.description: Dr Who writer Russell T Davies has said that he only cast gay actors in gay roles in his new CH4 drama 'Its a Sin'.  The writer claims he isn't being "woke" ...
